meanings: (아내의 언니) one's wife's elder sister, one's sister-in-law (who is older than one's wife)

vlive.korean: 강제 처형이죠. 잘 됐다! It's a punishment. Great! 듣기 View video GOT7 : #3분갓세븐_20171013_05

vlive.korean: 투표해서. - 한 명을 처형하는 거고. and vote. - and kill one person. 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - THE BEAT SEASON 4 -02- '육성재의 친구를 소개합니다!'

vlive.korean: 처형해 처형. - 빨리 너 앉아, 다음 질문할 거야. Execute him! - Sit down! We will ask you another question. 듣기 View video iKON : [KONIC TV] 코니들의 파이널 라운드!!
vlive.english: Execute him! - Sit down! We will ask you another question.

examples.korean: He was sentenced to death by electrocution. 발음듣기 그는 전기 처형형을 선고받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was sentenced to death by electrocution. 발음

examples.korean: The prisoners were executed by firing squad. 발음듣기 그 죄수들은 사격대에 의해 처형되었다[총살당했다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The prisoners were executed by firing squad. 발음

examples.korean: James Roach was electrocuted in South Carolina in 1986. 발음듣기 제임스 로흐는 1986년에 사우스캐롤라이나에서 전기 처형당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: James Roach was electrocuted in South Carolina in 1986. 발음

examples.korean: The prisoner will be put to death at dawn. 발음듣기 그 죄수는 동틀 무렵에 처형될 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The prisoner will be put to death at dawn. 발음

examples.korean: ‘Couldn’t you have just said no?’ ‘Well, hardly, she’s my wife’s sister.’ 발음듣기 “자네가 그냥 안 된다고 말할 수는 없었나?” “음, 전혀. 그녀는 내 처형[처제]인 걸.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Couldn’t you have just said no?’ ‘Well, hardly, she’s my wife’s sister.’ 발음
